University of Verona: The University of Verona (Italian: Universit√† degli Studi di Verona) is a university located in Verona, Italy. It was founded in 1982 and is organized in 12 Departments. The Italian business newspaper Il Sole 24 Ore ranked it as the best non-private university in Italy in 2014, 2015 and 2016.[1][2][3][4]
